com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql

Class RestoreDatabaseOperationsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.management.sql.RestoreDatabaseOperationsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>, RestoreDatabaseOperations

    public class RestoreDatabaseOperationsImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceOperations<SqlManagementClientImpl>, RestoreDatabaseOperations
    Contains the operation to create restore requests for Azure SQL Databases.
